page.title: 02ARTS AND CRAFTS:ASHLEWORTH
page.content: Many crafts are to be found in the area of our survey.Younger folk seem more interested in{television }and outdoor pursuits than art and craft. However there is evidence that once people are married they become more resourceful & develop an interest in creative pursuits. Locally these include: Painting Wood Carving Knitting Crochet Dressmaking Flower Arranging Pottery Embroidery Cookery Jewellery Making Flower pressing Enamelling Wine Making Photography Patchwork Quilts have been very popular.The{Women's Institute}has made several and the{School}also made one which was sold to raise money for school funds.
